knownIssues.summary: Creation of an Apex class with a dependency to a managed package directly by push fails to include the dependency in the meta XML file
knownIssues.title: SFDX: Creation of an Apex class with a dependency to a managed package directly by push fails to include the dependency in the meta XML file

knownIssues.summary:
Unable to create Unlocked Package if its metadata contain a class referencing to the PendingServiceRouting object, it throws an error :

"ERROR: OmniChannelService: Invalid type: PendingServiceRouting,OmniChannelService: Variable does not exist: queueItem,OmniChannelService: Invalid type
knownIssues.title: Unable to create Unlocked Package if its metadata contain a class referencing to the PendingServiceRouting object

knownIssues.summary:
For no namespace unlocked packages , IP protected metadata components behaves differently that how it does in case of mdapi:delpoy, eg of the components :

- Apex Class
- Apex Trigger
- Visualforce Component
knownIssues.title: For no-namespace unlocked packages,  IP protected metadata behaves differently than how mdapi:deploy does

knownIssues.summary:
Incorrect banner info about Installed Apex Class from an unlocked package. If you access an apex class (part of unlocked package) , it shows banner :

"This Apex class is editable You will loose any changes you make to this component if you later reinstall or upgrade this package "
knownIssues.title: Incorrect banner info about Installed Apex Class from an unlocked package.
